channel.title: [Fantasy World] - Assassins' Cheese
channel.description:
Hey peeps :slight_smile: I just want to share with you a small project of mine. It's a website chronicling the ongoing campaign of **[Fantasy World](https://tiny.cc/FantasyWorldRPG)** my group is playing right now, called [*Assassins Cheese*](https://sites.google.com/view/assassins-cheese/home). It's just a brief summary of each session's fictional events, so it reads like a story. But it also includes each dice roll made, with a link to the relevant move. And a (never 100% up to date) directory of the main Characters and Locations, with pictures taken here and there online.
Comments and questions (and suggestions) are very wellcome. Enjoy :mouse:
![AC_cover_fix|376x500](upload://an6rtuEQWDGjRElP4j8PekLqT1G.jpeg)
